star meet certain financial performance targets for the 2019 fiscal year (“2019 earnout target”) and an additional 5,000,000 of the company’s ordinary shares (“2020 earnout shares”) if glory star meet target is not met for the 2019 fiscal year and/or 2020 fiscal year but glory star meet certain financial performance targets for the 2019 fiscal year and 2020 fiscal year combined, the sellers will be entitled to receive any earnout shares that they otherwise did not. following the completion of the 2019 fiscal year, and in accordance with the terms of the share exchange agreement, the company determined that the 2019 earnout target were met and the sellers are entitled to the 2019 earnout shares. on april 22, 2020, the company issued the 2019 earnout shares to the sellers, or their combination, the company acquired all of the issued and outstanding securities of glory star in exchange for (i) approximately 41,204,025 of our ordinary shares (“closing payment shares”), or one combined, the sellers will be entitled to receive any earnout shares that they otherwise did not receive (the “alternative earnout”). in connection with the share exchange agreement: - tkk entered
